name: Glowy Bug Game
description:
Create light by reloading and shooting, and shoot the bugs that you can see!

Controls: Left mouse click (start, reload, and shoot)

Landing a shot will reload your gun, missing a shot will force you to reload. Use your reloads strategically to see your enemies approach, but score consecutive hits without reloading to gain a score multiplier!

Leave your high score in the comments!

V1.1 Changes (Submitted 19 hours after jam end):
- Fixed collision detection bug that occasionally made missed shots not empty gun
- Created browser playable version
